title: i found glitch on shop with blitzcrank
body: When you write to shop on champions Golem that will find you blitzcrank is that bug or something like that ??

replies.body:
No its not a bug.
You can search champions by their titles, Because blitzcrank title is "The Great Steam Golem" you can search Golem and it will show blitzcrank
Same as you will search Moon/Scorn and it will show you Diana cause her title is "Scorn of The Moon".
Glad i could help.

This guy knows what's up. Same with Teemo and typing 'S'. 

.....no it's not because he's satan it's because he's "The Swift Scout"!
